title: Standup Comedy - Robert Klein - 1974 - Mind Over Matter
description:
Review by Richie Unterberger - allmusic.com

Less grounded in childhood/adolescent experiences than his previous album, Mind Over Matter. Klein satirizes Jacques Cousteau, Borscht Belt comedians, mysticism, Watergate, and more with hilarious, educated sarcasm. Some of the topical references may have dated, but Klein&#039;s savage, knowing wit has not. There are also more brilliant TV commercial spoofs, especially "The Final Record Offer," a must-hear for anyone who&#039;s been assaulted by tacky album ads from the small screen.
